attributes.action: Provide legislation to stop Masterfoods using animal products in chocolate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mars, Milky Way, Bounty, Snickers, Galaxy, Twix and Maltesers are now all unsuitable for vegetarians. The manufacturer, Masterfoods, is now using animal products to create its chocolate bars.

As these chocolates were previously made without animal products, the Government should protect the public by ensuring manufacturers cannot include ingredients to established food products that may cause the food to be categorised differently.

rejection.details: Your petitio has been overtaken by events here
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
